**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 127 1.1 **Usage** affixed to armor or a weapon --- This ornate doorknob can open doors both material and metaphysical, revealing dreams and nightmares. The spell DC of any spell cast by activating this item is 20.
  • **Armor** You gain a +1 item bonus to [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) checks to [Pick a Lock](/Actions.aspx?ID=70).
  • **Weapon** If you critically succeed at a Strike with the weapon, the target is [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) until the end of its next turn.
Phantasmal Doorknob **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 127 1.1 **Price** 215 gp --- Phantasmal Doorknob (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 127 1.1 **Price** 900 gp --- The item bonus when affixed to armor is +2, and the spell DC is 27. On a critical hit with a weapon the doorknob is affixed to, the target is [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=1) until the end of its next turn. Phantasmal Doorknob (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 127 1.1 **Price** 6,000 gp --- The item bonus when affixed to armor is +2, and the spell DC is 34. On a critical hit with a weapon the doorknob is affixed to, the target is blinded until the end of its next turn.
name: Phantasmal Doorknob (Major)
